RagTag
======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which RagTag installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using RagTag, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load RagTag/2.0.1-foss-2020b
```
